full_summary:
# Venue for Training and Accommodations for RCMP H Division

## Solicitation Overview

The Career Development and Resourcing Section, Royal Canadian Mounted Police H Division, is seeking a venue to provide accommodations and training space for participants on an as-needed basis. The location must be centrally located in Nova Scotia, with a maximum distance of 110 km from the RCMP H Division Headquarters at 80 Garland Avenue, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

## Tender Solicitation

The procurement will be conducted as a Request for Standing Offers (RFSA), with vendors selected based on the lowest priced responsive bid. Interested vendors are required to submit their proposals to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

## Tender Description

The selected vendor will be required to provide training and accommodations for RCMP members and employees, primarily in Nova Scotia. The venue must be easily accessible and within the eligible locations.

## Evaluation and Award

Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest priced responsive bid. The successful vendor will be selected and notified, with the resulting contract including provisions related to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

## Indigenous Procurement and Business Opportunities

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this solicitation. The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource that can help Indigenous businesses compete for federal government contracts. Interested vendors can register and find more information at the following link: [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).

## Location Details

* Location(s): Nova Scotia
* Maximum Distance from RCMP H Division Headquarters: 110 km
* Eligible Locations: Central locations in Nova Scotia, including Colchester County, Hants County, and Halifax Regional Municipality.
